REGISTER.TITLE: Register
REGISTER.TERMS_ACCEPT: By signing up, you agree to our T & C and Privacy policy

ACCOUNT_NAME.LABEL: Account name
ACCOUNT_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter an account name. eg: Wayne Enterprises

FULL_NAME.LABEL: Full name
FULL_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your full name. eg: Bruce Wayne

EMAIL.LABEL: Work email
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your work email address. eg: bruce@wayne.enterprises

PASSWORD.LABEL: Password
PASSWORD.IS_INVALID_PASSWORD: Password should contain atleast 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number and 1 special character

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Не можа да се свърже с Woot сървър. Моля, опитайте отново по-късно
